A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve had to grow to love it over the last 48 hours. They take our characters we love and push them to the furthest edge. It’s uncomfortable and may even feel disappointing but Rian Johnson has written something that fits here. Not everyone enjoyed Empire Strikes Back at first because of how it took Star Wars and pushed it into a family drama. 10 years from now\, this may be hailed as THE BEST.
